title: Skagboys
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: Norman Vincente, 45, Edinburgh South, wine bar proprietor, father ofthree, unprotected sexual contact with intravenous drug user. Susan Woodburn, 20, Edinburgh North, Whisky Bonds worker, motherof one, unprotected sexual contact with intravenous drug user. Kylie Woodburn, 6 months, Edinburgh North, antibodies through birth.
